title: riot can you please just get rid of autofill.
body: it really makes the game not enjoyable  when your trying to play a certain role and get something you really dont want to play im not the type of person to dodge queues so i just suck it up and get ready to waste 20-30 minutes of my time playing a role and or a champion i was not looking forward to please just get rid of this toxic thing

replies.body:
I'd be happy if they just implemented role exclusion and didn't let players exclude support.

I'm sick of being autofilled into ADC.
